Miscellaneous Highlights: The result also secured USA's place in the next T20 World Cup in 2026
Others: USA have qualified for the Super Eight stage in their maiden T20 World Cup appearance
The no-result gave USA five points, which was enough for a second-place finish behind India in Group A
Friday's washout eliminated Pakistan, Canada and Ireland from Group A
Ireland are the only team in Group A without a win yet, having lost to India and Canada before the abandonment against USA
